title: {!parent} parser with scoreMode
description:
ToParentBlockJoinQuery has support for different score modes, but 
{!parent}
 parser has "None" mode hardcoded without an option to change it.
It would be usefull if there is a parameter to change the score mode or set a reasonable default.

comments.content: pls. Close it as a duplicate for SOLR-5882 where the patch exists.
